verbs.description: pruitt [V: changing] [ARG1: vols culture] [ARGM-MNR: by removing fear] jeremy pruitt is making tennessee football less afraid of its own shadow and the vols style of play is starting to reflect their new head coach demeanor tennessee vols rucker butch jones jeremy pruitt
